Title: Sharp Home
Description: Sharphome is designed to run on Windows and Linux (via the Mono Project) and is designed to be useful in home automation and home security.
HomeWiki:
Sharp Home

SmartHome is a .net application designed to run on Windows and Linux (via mono project).

It is designed to communicate with Insteon devices and allow for other capabilities useful for a home automation and home security system. At this time it is very much a work in progress.
